duties_responsibilities.duty: Double sales in 3 year time frame
Recruit, interview, and hire sales team
Lead sales team through empowerment, motivation, and incentivization
Update and train TAM on Grit's proven process
Develop sales plan and devise a sales strategy
Direct involvement in sales process, problem solving, and key accounts
Sales forecasting with goal setting and incentives
Manage and increase number of large key account relationships

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree preferred, but not required, based on work experience
